contentType.caseInfo: creation of Content Type with name, which contains white spaces
contentType.name: white space ctype
contentType.description: creation of Content Type with name, which contains white spaces

contentType.caseInfo: Creation of Content Type with invalid XML, missing display name in input
contentType.name: validname
contentType.description: Creation of Content Type with invalid XML, missing display name in input
contentType.configdata: <contenttype> <config name="Absence" version="1.0"> <form> <title name="resource" /> <block name="Fraværsmelding"> <input name="resource" required="true" type="text"> <xpath>contentdata/resource</xpath> </input> </block> </form> </config> </contenttype>

contentType.caseInfo: Creation of Content Type with invalid XML, missing xpath name in input
contentType.name: validname
contentType.description: Creation of Content Type with invalid XML, missing xpath name in input
contentType.configdata: <contenttype> <config name="Absence" version="1.0"> <form> <title name="resource" /> <block name="Fraværsmelding"> <input name="resource" required="true" type="text"> <display>Initialer</display> </input> </block> </form> </config> </contenttype>
